column5: Just a reminder that with the Walleye opener brings out road side checks. Here is an article that could save you some grief on the way home. http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/csb/new...r23bfs_03.html
Nice Post, thanks. I have been using the one fish per bag, skin tag on, water in bag method and it works fine. Fish stay nice for months.Paul
